info.description: WEB Service - Incident Management Technical Test - Production Environment

post.summary: Authenticates a user with username and password, returning JWT and refresh token if successful.
Registers a new user and returns tokens and user info if registration is successful.

requestBody.description: Registration data (username, email, password, first name, last name).

post.summary: Issues a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Revokes a specific refresh token, making it unusable for future requests.
Logs out the current user by revoking all their refresh tokens.

get.summary: Gets information about the currently authenticated user.

post.summary: Validates if a refresh token is still valid and active.

put.summary: Updates the profile information of the authenticated user.

requestBody.description: Profile data to update (email, first name, last name).

post.summary: Changes the password of the authenticated user.
Initiates the password reset process by sending a reset token to the user's email.
Resets the user's password using a valid reset token.

requestBody.description: Reset token and new password data.

post.summary: Validates password strength without storing it. Useful for real-time validation in frontend.
